dialogue: When she opened them, they were suddenly
in the middle of a Militia camp. But...
Oh no...
The warning was too late. The attack had already begun.
Wait a minute, those ships...
Spirit recognized the ships that were bombarding
the camp as models that attacked her.
So it was the Empire...
But Spirit was brought back to reality
when some Empire forces noticed her ship
suddenly appear out of no where.
Spirit grabbed Tom and dove for cover.
Bullets passed them overhead.
Great. Now what're we gonna do?
Mrrrrrrrrrnnnnnnnnn...
Tom glowed, and suddenly all the Empire ships and troops
rose into the air. They tried to move,
attack, do anything. But they couldn't.
Mmnnnnnnnnnrrrrrrrrrrrrr...
Tom brought them all together into a sphere.
Then, he increased his power, and crushed them.
Their screams filled the air as their bones broke and organs ruptured.
None of the Militia forces moved either.
They only watched the destruction before them.
Once the screams finally died down, Tom dropped
the ball of bodies and metals from the air.
Mnnnpp...Mrrn?
Tom was exhausted after his display of power.
He turned to Spirit, looking for praise.
But she had none to give.
Instead, she felt sick at what she just watched.
She turned around and emptied her stomach.
Blergh...
The militia soldiers, meanwhile, reorganized their forces and
assessed damages when they realized the power
from before wasn't targetting any of them.
